about_the_game:
HEART DUNGEON DEMO

Heart Dungeon is a project under development with no release date yet, but we want to give our players a taste of what's to come in this DEMO. It focuses on the game's combat, providing some items and spells for the player to test out different ways of fighting. You can try to complete the DEMO with different combinations of skills and items, thus deciding which way suits your playstyle.

Heart Dungeon is a 2.5D action Roguelite, with focus on dungeon exploration, item collection, skills and equipment, while the narrative is gradually presented through dialogues like a visual novel.

WHAT DOES YOUR HEART LOOK LIKE?

Leo is an imaginative boy who, after his daily activities like going to school and helping his mother with the housework, likes to play video games. One day, he gets a new game from his mother and finds himself immersed in it, transported inside his console.

As he ventures into the game, he begins to realize how some things from reality begin to manifest themselves within this fantasy world. Soon, he comes across Enfermo, a cadaverous figure who controls the monsters in the dungeon, a manifestation of the disease his mother is fighting. Motivated to save his mother, our protagonist decides to face the monster, since he sees a connection between what happens inside the game and the outside world. However, things are not that simple…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 4.0 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM / DirectX 11+ support
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Heart Dungeon DEMO is a 2.5D Roguelite about defeating monsters and strengthening your heart. Leo is a boy who receives a new game from his mother and finds himself immersed in it, transported to a virtual world that manifests things from his reality within this fantasy.
